title: Megan Gailey
description: Katie talks to comedian Megan Gailey about how the pandemic has affected her job, what it was like to get married right before quarantine, and the specific ways in which zoom funerals are weird. Also: a fun story from the time Megan wrote jokes for the ESPYs, and a less fun story about Katie’s worst memory from middle school.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie chats with comedian Megan Gailey about her career, marriage & more
itunes:summary: Katie talks to comedian Megan Gailey about how the pandemic has affected her job, what it was like to get married right before quarantine, and the specific ways in which zoom funerals are weird. Also: a fun story from the time Megan wrote jokes for the ESPYs, and a less fun story about Katie’s worst memory from middle school.
